name: Redemption Headpiece
tooltip:
Redemption HeadpieceLevel 60

Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Redemption Headpiece if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Headpiece, 15 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 5 Arcanite Bars and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Headpiece
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 15
- Arcanite Bar x 5
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
